data: Terms of Use for nello one, the nello Platform, the nello App and the nello website. Date: 8th of March 2019
General

1.1 The following provisions govern the handling of your personal data by locumi labs GmbH, Zweibrückenstr. 2, 80331 München, Germany, (in the following "nello") with regard to nello one, AXA parcel theft protection, installation service (in the following "Products"), the nello platform ("Platform"), the nello mobile app ("App") and the nello website available at www.nello.io.
1.2 You can access the privacy policy at any time within the App, retrieve it from the website at nello.io/privacy
Data controller

nello is the data controller with regard to all data processed as described in the following. You can contact us at any time at hello@nello.io We would also like to point out that you have the following rights at all times: Right of access, rectification, cancellation, limitation, objection, revocation of consent, data transferability and complaint to the supervisory authority.
Products, Platform, App and Website
The following provisions of this section 3 do apply to the use of the Products, the Platform and the App.
3.1 Automated data collection

3.1.1 When the Platform is accessed via the App or via another device, for technical reasons, the following data will automatically be transmitted to nello: IP address, date and time of access, endpoint that was accessed, status/result of the endpoint action, the session id of the user, secure cookie and geolocation.
label: collection

data: 3.1.2 When the Products or the App are used, for technical reasons, the following data will automatically be transmitted to nello: type of intercom, intercom bell signal, intercom buzzer signal, every entrance attempt (successful and unsuccessful) and who tried to enter if available.
label: collection

data: 3.1.3 The foregoing data will be used to technically enable you to use the Products, the Platform and the App. Additionally, the data may be evaluated for statistical purposes and to improve the service offered in a pseudonymous form. You may object to such use of your data. See section 8.2 for further details.
label: collect_purpose

data: 3.2 Data entered by the user

3.2.1 Before being able to use the Platform and the App, you have to create a user account. For this purpose, you must enter first name, last name, e-mail address, address and password. These data are required in order to create and administer the user account for you.
label: collection
collect_purpose

data: 3.2.2 You also may deactivate the use of cookies and remove existing cookies in your web browser. For further information, please refer to your browser's help function.
Use of usage data

7.1 Your personal data necessary for enabling you to use services offered by Locumi ("Usage Data") will be used for handling the contractual relationship. Such Usage Data shall comprise your first name, last name, email address, address, location/gps data, service provider used, other users that have access to your location (first name, last name, email address and their location), every opening transaction with a time stamp and data as described in section 3.2.
label: collect_purpose

data: 7.2 Usage Data may be used by nello in anonymized form if need be, for the purposes of advertising, market research, improvement of services and for creating pseudonymous user profiles. You may object to the creation of pseudonymous user profiles. See section 8.2 for further details on how to object.
label: collect_purpose

data: 7.3 Your data may furthermore be used for the purposes described in the section 5, to the extent you have given your respective consent.
label: collect_purpose

data: 3.6 Social Plug-ins

3.6.1 Our website may contain links to other websites or features from third party providers. This Privacy Policy covers the privacy practices by nello, and does not cover the privacy practices of third party websites or providers. nello is not responsible for the privacy policies or practices of third parties. With regard to any data processing by such third parties, we refer to their respective privacy policy. The following social plug-ins are available on our website:
3.6.2 Facebook
label: sharing

data: 3.6.2.1 We use Facebook Like/Share button social plug-ins (provided by Facebook Ireland Limited, 4 Grand Canal Square, Dublin 2, Ireland) to enable you to easily "Like"/"Share" content found on our website, and thereby share this content with your Facebook Friends. No data is transmitted to Facebook by simply visiting our websites. Data is only transmitted when you have enabled the plug-in by clicking on the corresponding link.
label: share_purpose

data: 3.6.2.2 Whenever you view a page of our website containing such plug-in being enabled, your browser establishes a direct connection to the servers operated by Facebook. As a result, the content of the social plug-in is transferred by Facebook directly to your browser and embedded in the website being shown. If you visit our website whilst signed in to your Facebook user account, information concerning your visit will be transferred to Facebook and Facebook can assign your visit to our website to your user account. Please note that a data transfer is triggered already when you visit our website with social plug-ins being enabled, irrespective whether you interact with the plug-in. Information arising from interaction with the Facebook plug-ins (such as by clicking the Facebook "Like"/"Share" button or by leaving a comment) will be directly transferred to and stored by Facebook. To prevent this you must log out of your Facebook account before visiting our website. Please refer to Facebook's privacy policy https://www.facebook.com/policy.php for more information on the purpose and scope of data collection and data analysis undertaken by Facebook as well as your options to modify settings and how to protect your privacy.
3.6.3 FACEBOOK CONVERSION TRACKING
label: sharing

data: Moreover the website uses Facebook's "Visitors Action pixels" to support online marketing measures. With its help we can track the actions of users after they have seen or clicked on a Facebook advertisement. This enables us to detect the effectiveness of Facebook advertisements for statistical and market research purposes. The data is used in accordance with Facebook's Data Use Policy (https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy).
label: share_purpose

data: 3.6.4 FACEBOOK REMARKETING
label: sharing

data: Our website uses Facebooks' remarketing or "Custom Audience" function. With this option we can target individuals with personalised, interest-based advertising-ads. To do so Facebook uses cookies. These cookies are small files containing a numeric code in the browser of visitors to the website. Personal data of visitors to the website is not stored.
label: share_purpose

data: 3.6.5 Twitter ("Tweet Button")
label: sharing

data: 3.6.5.1 We use Twitter Share button social plug-ins (provided by witter Inc., 1355 Market St, Suite 900, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA ("Twitter") to enable you to easily "Share" content found on our website, and thereby share this content on your Twitter account. No data is transmitted to Twitter by simply visiting our websites. Data is only transmitted when you have enabled the plug-in by clicking on the corresponding link. The plugins are marked with a Twitter logo for example in the form of a blue "Twitter bird." An overview of the Twitter plugins and their appearance can be found here: https://twitter.com/about/resources/buttons
label: share_purpose

data: 3.6.5.2 When you visit a page of our website that contains such a social plugin, your browser makes a direct connection to the servers of Twitter. The content of the plugin is transferred from Twitter directly to your browser and integrated into the website. Because of this integration Twitter receives the information that your browser has accessed the relevant page of our website, even if you do not have a profile on Twitter or are just not logged into Twitter. This information (including your IP address) is transmitted from your browser directly to a server of Twitter in the US and stored there. If you are logged into Twitter, Twitter can connect your visit to our site to your Twitter account directly. If you interact with the plugins, for example by pressing the "Tweet" button, you agree that the corresponding information is also transmitted directly to a server of Twitter and stored there. The information will also be published on your Twitter account and may be presented to your contacts. For learning more about the purpose and the scope of data collection and further processing and use of your data by Twitter and your rights in this respect and settings options for protecting your privacy please refer to the privacy policies of Twitter: https://twitter.com/privacy. If you do not want that Twitter associates data collected on our website directly with your Twitter account, you need to log out of Twitter before your visit to our website. You can prevent loading of the Twitter plugins in your browser by using browser add ons, such as the script blocker "NoScript" ( http://noscript.net/).
3.6.6 Twitter Tailored Audience
label: sharing

data: Our website uses the "Tailored Audience" function. With this option we can appeal to visitors to the site with targeted advertisements. To do so Twitter uses so called tags. No personal data is stored in these tags.
label: share_purpose

You can unsubscribe from marketing emails and the newsletter at any time, either by de-registering from this service on the Platform, or by clicking on the unsubscribe link at the end of each marketing email or newsletter. Deletion of data, retention of data

6.1 Data protection is very important to us. We only use services that comply with the new GDPR. If a service provider is located outside of the EU, we have entered into a data processing addendum with this provider to safeguard the data backup requirements.

6.2Nello will store your data indefinitely to the extent necessary and permissible. If you no longer wish to use nello, you can completely delete your user account on the platform. Simply send an e-mail with the subject "Delete profile" to hello@nello.io. Please note that after deletion of the user account, use of the platform and the app is no longer possible.
3.3 Cookies

3.3.1 We use cookies on the Platform, the App and Website to give you the best user experience. Cookies are sets of data which are stored by your web browser and which contain data. If your consent is necessary in this respect, cookies will only be used if you have granted the required consent.
3.3.2 You also may deactivate the use of cookies and remove existing cookies in your web browser. For further information, please refer to your browser's help function.
3.3.3 In case you prevent the storage of cookies by setting your browser software accordingly, you may possibly not be able to fully use all features on the App, Website and Platform.
Information rights
